ref.mixed-citation: M.G.S. Borba, et al., Chloroquine diphosphate in two different dosages as adjunctive therapy of hospitalized patients with severe respiratory syndrome in the context of coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) infection: preliminary safety results of a randomized, double-blinded, phase IIb clinical trial (CloroCovid-19 Study), Infect. Diseases (except HIV/AIDS), (2020). doi:10.1101/2020.04.07.20056424.
